mapper.select: select product_no,product_img,product_name,product_price from (select rownum num,product_no,product_img,product_name,product_price from (select product_no,product_img,product_name,product_price from product where category_code=#{category_code} order by product_date desc)) where num between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from product where category_code=#{category_code}

select product_no,category_code,product_name from (select rownum num,product_no,category_code,product_name from (select product_no,category_code,product_name from product order by product_no desc)) where num between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_no, category_code, product_name, product_price, product_desc, product_date, product_img, product_margin) values(#{product_no},#{category_code},#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_desc},#{product_date},#{product_img},0)
mapper.update: update product set product_price = #{product_price}, product_margin=#{product_margin} where product_no=#{product_no}
